title: This looks like Bank Gothic to me with a rounded top and bottom. The cutout style is likely done in Illustrator.
content:
Hello,

Ever see a font like this?

Thanks for looking!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071901im_/http:/typophile.com/files/s_5112.jpg)

Font: 

 Franchise 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071901/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: KOL3SLAW

comments.content: I can't find an exact match, but if you want to recreate it, I think it could be easier to start with something like **[Plak Black Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071901/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype&ffam=Plak%20LT%20BlackCondensed%20-%20Regular&fid=c63b023c78a7ecc8795774718312265a&fsize=60&text=S&fit=1)** and not Bank Gothic

With one letter to base this on, it's hard to be sure, but I'm crediting this to Ryuk. The S sure seems to match.

- Mike Yanega
